name: Verbal Reasoning Test
description: Assesses a candidate's ability to understand and evaluate written information.

name: Numerical Reasoning Test
description: Measures numerical understanding, data interpretation, and mathematical logic.

name: Logical Reasoning Test
description: Evaluates abstract thinking and the ability to identify patterns in data.

name: Situational Judgment Test
description: Assesses decision-making and judgment in workplace-related scenarios.

name: OPQ32 Personality Questionnaire
description: Measures 32 dimensions of personality relevant to occupational settings.

name: Mechanical Comprehension Test
description: Evaluates understanding of mechanical and physical principles.

name: Motivation Questionnaire (MQ)
description: Assesses what drives and motivates an individual at work.

name: Inductive Reasoning Test
description: Tests the ability to identify patterns and logical rules in abstract information.

name: Deductive Reasoning Test
description: Evaluates the ability to draw logical conclusions from given information.

name: Situational Strengths Test
description: Identifies key strengths and preferences in workplace behavior.

name: Critical Thinking Test
description: Assesses reasoning, problem solving, and argument analysis skills.

name: Sales Potential Assessment
description: Analyzes traits and behaviors linked to sales effectiveness.

name: Customer Service Scenario Test
description: Assesses situational decision-making in customer service environments.

name: Graduate Aptitude Test
description: Comprehensive test for graduate-level cognitive abilities.

name: Digital Readiness Assessment
description: Evaluates adaptability and comfort with digital tools and tech.

name: Leadership Judgement Indicator
description: Measures leadership decision-making and preferred leadership styles.

name: Emotional Intelligence Questionnaire (EIQ)
description: Assesses emotional awareness, control, and empathy.

name: Coding Simulation Test
description: Evaluates hands-on programming skills in a simulated environment.

name: Data Interpretation Test
description: Assesses ability to interpret and analyze visual or tabular data.

name: Workplace English Proficiency Test
description: Tests grammar, vocabulary, and comprehension for business English usage.
